Once Upon a Time in the West / a movie experience

Opinions / Seen/Sawn

I watched Once Upon a Time in the West (OUTITW) the first time the other night, and it was awesome. It was directed by Sergio Leone, with very beautiful cinematography, and as always with Westerns, provided an interesting window into popular attitudes of the time it was filmed, in this case the late 60′s. Westerns are interesting because they are a period in US …..Keep on reading……..
